price: 78. So the earthquake seized them, and they lay (dead), prostrate in their homes.
arabic: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دَارِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhathumu al-rajfatu fa-aṣbaḥū fī dārihim jāthimīna
